title: Welcome, traveller
message:
Hi traveller, I'm Liora the fairy. Welcome to the Mystical Garden. There's a mystery to find today and it cannot be revealed to everyone. You've found my first note - I've hidden the rest around here.

To get started, enter your name...
next_message: Go back to where you once entered the garden; you'll find my next note. Good luck, traveller!

title: At the Garden Entrance
message: This note can only be opened by the author. Please enter the fairy's name:
next_message:
Well done, traveller! You found my next note.

I've hidden a note where you capture memories with flashes and poses. Go past the music and remember to smile.

title: At the Photobooth
message: Did you remember to do what I said?
next_message:
You're doing great, traveller! All this running around must be making you tired.

There's a place to quench your thirst. You might need a token for a drink and a flower for my note.

title: At the Drinks Bar
next_message:
You found my last note.

This is where I found a special drink and it turned me into a human! You should come and find me in the garden. I'm short and fierce and wearing a red dress. I'll know you're the traveler when you ask me my name.
